dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.product.prod.ProductCharacteristicValue
dataStructure.description:
A value of a ProductSpecCharacteristic chosen for a Product that further defines what the Product is.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ProductCharacteristicValue

child.name: value
child.description:
A fact that describes a Product.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

child.name: validFor
child.description:
